saukhya amathiwaraya samanga pasugiyada (1) pawathi sakachchawe di adala niladharinta me upades laba di thibe.hediyanta wasara 12 kin usaswim labima nolabunu athara ee sambandhayen saukhya amathiwaraya saha maha bhandagara lekamwaraya samanga kala sakachchawala prathipalayak lesa adala gataluwa soya balimata wellappuli kamituwa path kala bawa rajya sewa eksath heda sangamaye sabhapathi muruththettuwe aananda himiyan prakasha kalaha.ema kamituwe nirdesha amathi mandalayata idiripath kirimen anathuruwa hediyanta da me usas wim labadena lesa anumathiya labi thibena bawa da unwahanse kiha.atharu waidya sewa wruththikayanta me usas wim labunu athara hediyanta usas wim nolabima sambandhayen pasugiya kalaye digin digatama sakachcha pawathwu bawath ehi prathipalayak lesa usas wim labadimata kabinat anumathiya labi athi bawath unwahanse pawasuha.gunathmaka ha karyakshama saukhya sewawak labadi merata nidahas saukhya sewawa shakthimath kirimata heda hediyan ganna uthsahayata owunta himi waraprasada labiya yuthu bawa sangamaya pawasayi.owunta himi waraprasada niyamitha kalayanta anuwa labimen thamange sewawa sambandhayen unandu wi mitath wada honda saukhya sewawak godanangimata owunta haki wanu athayi muruththettuwe aananda himiyan pawasuha.

frisosiya ithihasaya pilibanda minisekuge ... 1-mema darshanaya parinatha wimen pasuwa, thadabala darshanika bhugoliya awashyathawayak sandaha wisheshayen salakilimath wana athara (bhu-darshanaya), ee ese nam, ehi wasthun, ehi aawarthayak, ehi aththikaram saha pramanathmakawu niwaradiwa wisthara kirima sandaha nithyanukula kanassalla wadi wita, ehi abhyanthara nishpadana ho ehi piliganime bahu agayima pilibanda athyawashya eya sudusukam labimatath, eya sidu karana kalaya thuladi ehi wiwidha kriyakarakam pilibandawa wiwechanathmaka winishchayak prakasha kirimata athi awashyathawayath, pasuwa darshanaye ithihasaya wistharanaya kirime waishayika kondesi apa hata wiwrutha wiya widyawe ithihasayen wen kala nohaki ya. 2 - mema kruthiya smedge wadagath kruthiya soya ganimata pera, darshanawadi ithihasaye iwasiliwantha ha dhairya sampanna sthana thabu aprikanu, namuth wasthuwak ithiriwa thibini nopahadili krama, prashnagatha samanya aawarthayak saha awama washayen sarabhuthawadi abhyanthara artha nirupanayan thula ya.

pasugiya wasara dahayaka kalayedi lokaye widesha rakiya kshethraya wishala washayen wardhanaya wi thibena bawada eya rate aarthikaye wishesha angayak bawata pathwa thibena bawada hethema sandahan kaleya.widesha ratawalata sankramanaya wana pirisen siyayata 85k rakiya wenuwen bawa penwa dun ee mahatha widesha rakiyawanta gos yali meratata paminena shri lankikayan nawa hakiyawan, nawa danuma, mudal saha abhiyogayanta muhunadime hakiyawen samanwitha bawada eya rataka aarthikaye paladayithawayata behewinma hithakara wana bawada prakasha kaleya.pasugiya 2012 wasaredi ayawaya idiripath karamin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wisin merata karmantha karuwan wenuwen sahana saha sahayogaya labadannata piyawara gathbawa sihipath kala aacharya pi.bi jayasundara mahatha widesha rakiya sandaha gos yali paminena ayatada karmantha aarambha kirime hakiyawa thibena bawa kiweya.
